TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Menu extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class Menu Inherits Component
public ref class Menu abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 表示所有菜单的基本功能。

span.span: Represents the base functionality for all menus.

summary.span: 虽然 和 取代了以前版本的 控件并向其中添加了功能，但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和供将来使用。

span.span: Although and replace and add functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是适用于基， ，和类。This class is the base class for the , , and classes. 无法创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. 应用程序 consist 的菜单对象。The menus for an application consist of objects. 这些可以包含其他对象，表示子菜单项。These can contain other objects, representing submenu items. 对象可以存储在以显示为窗体的整个菜单结构或用于显示快捷菜单。The objects can be stored in a for display as an entire menu structure for a form or a that is used to display shortcut menus. 此类提供的所有菜单类通用功能。This class provides functionality that is common for all the menu classes. 与很多个基类，不同类使用其派生的类定义许多其属性。Unlike many base classes, the class uses its derived classes to define many of its properties. 如果你将你的菜单在多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序，则可以使用属性指定你的应用程序中显示打开的 MDI 子窗体的列表。If you are using your menu in a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, you can use the property to specify a that displays a list of open MDI child forms in your application. 属性包含的列表菜单类中存储的对象。The property contains a list of objects stored in the menu class. 有关或，此属性包含所有显示对象。For a or , this property contains all the objects that are displayed. 有关、属性表示与之关联的子菜单项。For a , the property represents the submenu items associated with it. 除了为所有派生的菜单类提供的属性类还提供了方法，如和，使您能够从现有的菜单，创建新的菜单，还将合并两个菜单结构在一起。In addition to the properties that are provided for all the derived menu classes, the class also provides methods, such as and , that enable you to create new menus from existing menus, and also merge two menu structures together. 类还定义了嵌套的类。The class also defines the nested class . 此类定义的集合使用对象属性。This class defines the collection of objects used by the property. 你可以使用的方法类来添加和删除菜单项从， ，或。You can use the methods of the class to add and remove menu items from a , , or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， ，若要创建窗体的菜单结构。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a menu structure for a form. 该示例代码将添加表示顶级菜单项，用于选择字体大小，将子菜单项添加到它，然后将两个子菜单项添加到表示应用程序中的大型和小型字体选择该菜单项。The example code adds a to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application. 该示例需要有对象名为`mainMenu1`和第四个对象命名的`menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。The example requires that there is a object named `mainMenu1` and four objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. [!code-cpp[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将复制的整个列表对象 (存储在中传递到`menuSrc`) 到当前菜单。This method copies the entire list of objects (stored in the passed in to `menuSrc`) into the current menu. 可以使用此方法在派生类中克隆对象。You can use this method in your derived class to clone objects. 然后可以由其他类派生自重用它们，如， ，和。They can then be reused by other classes that derive from , such as , , and . ## Examples 此示例将创建主菜单中， `mainMenu1`，有三个菜单项： `File`， `Edit`，和`View`。This example creates a main menu, `mainMenu1`, with three menu items: `File`, `Edit`, and `View`. 然后，它使用方法以复制`mainMenu1`到`mainMenu2`。It then uses the method to copy `mainMenu1` into `mainMenu2`. 然后，克隆菜单上是分配给窗体，并显示。The cloned menu is then assigned to the form and displayed. 此程序要求你已创建名为`Form1`。This program requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则为资源是使用不会被释放之前垃圾集合调用对象的析构函数。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu GetContextMenu() cil managed

summary.span: 获取包含该菜单的 。

span.span: Gets the that contains this menu.
The that contains this menu.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于获取对引用中包含此菜单。This method allows you to obtain a reference to the that this menu is contained in. 此属性返回`null`如果菜单未包含在。This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a . 发生这种情况中包含菜单上或，或如果菜单未包含在任何菜单。This can occur if the menu is contained in a or , or if the menu is not contained in any menu. 你可以使用此属性，以确定是否当前正在使用一个菜单，以及确定的位置。You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where. ## Examples 在此示例中，你使用方法来获取对包含的快捷菜单的引用`menuItem1`或`menuItem2`，并在消息框中显示的快捷菜单信息。In this example, you use the method to obtain a reference to the shortcut menu that contains `menuItem1` or `menuItem2`, and display the shortcut menu information in a message box. 以编程方式创建具有以下两项的快捷菜单`New`和`Open`。You programmatically create a shortcut menu with two items, `New` and `Open`. 您然后通过添加功能对这些项创建相应的事件处理程序。You then add functionality to these items by creating the appropriate event handlers. 当运行示例时，可以告诉你为了显示的快捷菜单右键单击该表单的消息框。When you run the example, you get a message box that tells you to right-click the form in order to display the shortcut menu. 然后，单击菜单项时，你将收到另一个消息，告知哪一项单击后，并包含的快捷菜单上显示的信息。Then, when you click a menu item, you get another message that tells which item has been clicked and displays the information on the containing shortcut menu. 此示例需要你已创建名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu GetMainMenu() cil managed

summary.span: 获取包含该菜单的 。

span.span: Gets the that contains this menu.
The that contains this menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于获取对引用目前位于此菜单。This method allows you to obtain a reference to the this menu is currently located in. 此属性返回`null`如果菜单未包含在。This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a . 发生这种情况中包含菜单上或，或如果菜单未包含在任何菜单。This can occur if the menu is contained in a or , or if the menu is not contained in any menu. 你可以使用此属性，以确定是否当前正在使用一个菜单，以及确定的位置。You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where. ## Examples 此示例声明， `mainMenu1`，和四个菜单项， `menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。This example declares a , `mainMenu1`, and four menu items, `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. 仅第三个菜单项被添加到`mainMenu1`进行显示。Only the first three menu items are added to `mainMenu1` for display. 程序然后检查是否`menuItem3`正在使用中，即`true`，并确定使用它的形式。The program then checks to see if `menuItem3` is being used, which is `true`, and determines the form in which it is used. 标签文本用于显示的窗体中承载的名称。A label text is used to display the name of the form that hosts the . 如果更改为所测试的菜单项目`menuItem4`，条件计算结果为`false`因为`menuItem4`从未使用过。If you change the menu item being tested to `menuItem4`, the condition evaluates to `false` because `menuItem4` has never been used. 此示例需要你已创建了名为`MyForm`包括名为`label1`。This example requires that you have created a named `MyForm` that includes a named `label1`. [!code-cpp[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法以确定是否有任何对象均分配到此菜单。You can use this method to determine whether any objects are assigned to this menu. 这相当于检查`null`中属性。This is equivalent to checking for `null` in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建包含两个对象。The following code example creates a with two objects. 然后，它使用属性来确定是否`mainMenu1`包含菜单项。It then uses the property to determine whether `mainMenu1` contains menu items. 如果条件的计算结果`true`，它将设置属性`true`并将绑定到的主菜单。If the condition evaluates `true`, it sets the property to `true` and binds the main menu to the . 此示例要求你拥有创建命名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于获取对的当前存储在菜单中的菜单项列表的引用。You can use this property to obtain a reference to the list of menu items that are currently stored in the menu. 有关和对象，属性包含在控件中的整个菜单结构。For and objects, the property contains the entire menu structure in the control. 有关类，属性包含与关联的子菜单项的列表。For the class, the property contains the list of submenu items associated with the . 与对 （此属性提供） 的菜单的菜单项的集合的引用，你可以添加和删除菜单项、 确定的菜单项总数以及清除集合中的菜单项的列表。With the reference to the collection of menu items for the menu (provided by this property), you can add and remove menu items, determine the total number of menu items, and clear the list of menu items from the collection. 有关维护一个菜单的菜单项集合的详细信息，请参阅文档。For more information on maintaining the menu item collection for a menu, see the documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的派生类中，实例，并将添加对象向其集合对象。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, , and adds a object to its collection of objects. 此示例需要在此示例中定义的方法是位于窗体的类和由该窗体类中方法调用。This example requires that the method defined in this example is located within the class for a form and called by a method in that form class. [!code-cpp[Classic Menu.MenuItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu.MenuItems Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Menu.MenuItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu.MenuItems Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Menu.MenuItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu.MenuItems Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MergeMenu(class System.Windows.Forms.Menu menuSrc) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub MergeMenu (menuSrc As Menu)

param.name: menuSrc
param.span: 其菜单项与当前菜单的菜单项合并的 。

span.span: The whose menu items are merged with the menu items of the current menu.

summary.span: 将一个菜单的 对象与当前菜单合并。

span.span: Merges the objects of one menu with the current menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将合并对象从一个与当前菜单的菜单。This method merges objects from one menu with the current menu. 对象的值根据进行合并和属性。 objects are merged according to the values of the and properties. 合并带有那些其活动的 MDI 子窗体的多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体菜单通常为了菜单合并。Menu merging is typically done to merge the menus of a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent form with those of its active MDI child form. 这是由.NET Framework 公共语言运行时自动执行。This is performed automatically by the .NET Framework common language runtime. 例如，如果一个 MDI 父窗体包含一组用于处理文件的菜单和 MDI 子窗体还具有与文件相关的菜单项，菜单集将自动合并为单个文件菜单设置在 MDI 父窗体中显示的子窗体时。For example, if an MDI parent form contains a set of menus for handling files and your MDI child form also has file-related menu items, the menu sets will automatically merge into a single file menu set when the child form is displayed in the MDI parent form. 你可以使用方法如果你正在合并两个不是 MDI 应用程序的一部分的菜单结构。You can use the method if you are merging two menu structures that are not part of an MDI application. 可以通过调用此实现或类以合并两个或多个对象派生自。This implementation can be called by the or classes to merge two or more objects that derive from . 合并两个对象，请使用方法。To merge two objects use the method. ## Examples 此示例将创建两个菜单：`mainMenu1`和`mainMenu2`。This example creates two menus, `mainMenu1` and `mainMenu2`. 第一个菜单包含一个， `File`，和第二个包含一个， `Edit`。The first menu contains one , `File`, and the second contains one , `Edit`. 使用方法，`mainMenu2`与合并`mainMenu1`。Using the method, `mainMenu2` is merged with `mainMenu1`. 显示时，`mainMenu1`将包含两个菜单项`File`和`Edit`。When displayed, `mainMenu1` will contain the two menu items, `File` and `Edit`. 此示例需要你已创建了名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 它已尝试将菜单与自己合并在一起。

span.span: It was attempted to merge the menu with itself.
